title: A Worst-Case Scenario (with Kirsty Blackman MP)
itunes:title: A Worst-Case Scenario (with Kirsty Blackman MP)
description:
SNP Deputy Westminster Leader Kirsty Blackman and King's College London Professor Jonathan Portes speak to Bloomberg's Caroline Hepker and Sebastian Salek. They discuss the government's no-deal Brexit planning documents and the politicisation of the courts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
